Description:
Model
Brand: XPG
Series: INVADER X
Model: INVADERXMT-BKCWW


Details
Type Type: ATX Mid Tower
Color: Black
Case Material: SPCC / 3mm Tempered Glass
Motherboard Compatibility Motherboard Compatibility: ATX / Micro ATX / Mini ITX
Side Panel Side Panel: SPCC / 3mm Tempered Glass


Front Panel Ports
Front Ports: USB 3.2 Gen2 Type-C x 1, USB 3.2 Type-A x 2, HD Audio Port x 1, Power Button x 1, Reset Button x 1


Cooling System
Fan Options: REAR :120mm x 1 / 140mm x 1 
TOP:120mm x 3 / 140mm x 2 
Side:120mm x 3 
Bottom: 120mm x 1 / 140mm x 1 
PSU shroud : 120mm x 2
Radiator Options: REAR:120mm 
TOP: Up to 360mm 
Side: Up to 360mm(Vertical graphics card only)


Dimensions & Weight
Max GPU Length: 400mm (Vertical / Horizontal GPU Mounting without side radiator) 270mm (Horizontal GPU Mounting with side Radiator) Graphic Card Vertical Installation height clearance: 30.5mm
Max CPU Cooler Height: 175 mm
Max PSU Length: 240 mm
Dimensions: 20.31*12.57*22.67 inches
Weight: 22.48 lbs


Additional Info
Features: (1) PCIe 4.0 x16 Riser Cable - 180mm (Compatible with PCI Express 4.0 and below) 
(2) Pre-Installed 4 x Reversed Fans + 1 x Regular Fan.


Additional Information
